exercise.content: The company did not invest in cybersecurity; hackers breached their systems
exercise.answer: If the company had invested in cybersecurity, hackers would not have breached their systems.

exercise.content: The IT team failed to perform regular data backups; critical files were lost during the server crash
exercise.answer: If the IT team had performed regular data backups, critical files would not have been lost during the server crash.

exercise.content: The software developers rushed the product release; the application had numerous bugs and glitches
exercise.answer: If the software developers had not rushed the product release, the application would not have had numerous bugs and glitches.

exercise.content: The company did not provide adequate training; employees struggled to use the new software efficiently
exercise.answer: If the company had provided adequate training, employees would not have struggled to use the new software efficiently.

exercise.content: The project manager underestimated the complexity of the task; the team missed the deadline
exercise.answer: If the project manager had not underestimated the complexity of the task, the team would not have missed the deadline.
